thread.title: Clay Helton excited for 2nd chance as USC's interim coach
thread.title_full: Clay Helton excited for 2nd chance as USC's interim coach

title: Clay Helton excited for 2nd chance as USC's interim coach
text:
> Indiana Clay Helton excited for 2nd chance as USC's interim coach Southern California interim head coach Clay Helton conducts an NCAA college football practice in Los Angeles Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015. The Trojans offensive coordinator, Helton is taking over for head coach Steve Sarkisian, who was fired Monday. (AP Photo/Richard Hartog)
